TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ZipArchiveEntry extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 zip 档案中的压缩文件。

span.span: Represents a compressed file within a zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Zip 存档包含每个压缩文件的条目。A zip archive contains an entry for each compressed file. 使用 类可以检查项的属性，然后打开或删除该项。The class enables you to examine the properties of an entry, and open or delete the entry. 打开某个条目时，可以通过写入该压缩文件的流来修改压缩的文件。When you open an entry, you can modify the compressed file by writing to the stream for that compressed file. 操作 zip 存档的方法和它们的文件条目分布在三个类中： 、 和 。The methods for manipulating zip archives and their file entries are spread across three classes: , and . |自...To…|使用...Use…| |---------|----------| |从目录创建 zip 存档Create a zip archive from a directory|| |将 zip 存档的内容提取到目录Extract the contents of a zip archive to a directory|| |将新文件添加到现有 zip 存档Add new files to an existing zip archive|| |在 zip 存档中检索文件Retrieve an file in a zip archive|| |检索 zip 存档中的所有文件Retrieve all of the files in a zip archive|| |打开 zip 存档中包含的单个文件的流To open a stream to an individual file contained in a zip archive|| |删除 zip 存档中的文件Delete a file from a zip archive|| 如果在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集，则可以访问 类的两个扩展方法。If you reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project, you can access two extension methods for the class. 这些方法是 和 的，它们使你能够将项的内容解压缩到文件中。Those methods are and , and they enable you to decompress the contents of the entry to a file. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集在 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]中不可用。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available in [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用中，可以通过使用 或 解压缩存档的内容，也可以使用 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 类型压缩程序和[解压缩](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246358)程序[压缩和解压缩](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246357)文件。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you can decompress the contents of an archive by using or , or you can use the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] types [Compressor](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246357) and [Decompressor](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246358) to compress and decompress files. ## Examples 第一个示例演示如何在 zip 存档中创建新项并对其进行写入。The first example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive and write to it. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)] 第二个示例演示如何使用 扩展方法。The second example shows how to use the extension method. 若要执行代码，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。You must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project for the code to execute. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

span.span: The compressed size of the entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当模式设置为 ，或者模式设置为 并且已打开该项时，无法检索此属性。This property cannot be retrieved when the mode is set to , or the mode is set to and the entry has been opened. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索 zip 存档中的条目，以及如何计算条目的属性。The following example shows how to retrieve entries in a zip archive, and evaluate the properties of the entries. 它使用 属性显示项的名称，并使用 和 属性来计算文件的压缩量。It uses the property to display the name of the entry, and the and properties to calculate how much the file was compressed. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 由于项已修改，属性的值不可用。

span.span: The value of the property is not available because the entry has been modified.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ExternalAttributes { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ExternalAttributes : int with get, set

summary.span: 操作系统和应用程序特定的文件属性。

span.span: OS and application specific file attributes.

value.span: 编写此输入时由应用程序编写的外部属性。

span.span: The external attributes written by the application when this entry was written.

value.span: 这同时依赖于主机操作系统和应用程序。

span.span: It is both host OS and application dependent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部属性的映射与主机系统相关。The mapping of the external attributes is host-system dependent. 对于 MS-DOS，低序位字节是 MS-DOS 目录属性字节。For MS-DOS, the low order byte is the MS-DOS directory attribute byte. 对于 Unix，高序位字节经常用于存储文件权限。For Unix, the high Order byte is frequently used to store the file permissions. 如果输入来自标准输入，则将此字段设置为零。If input came from standard input, this field is set to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FullName As String
public: property System::String ^ FullName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 zip 存档中的项的相对路径。

span.span: Gets the relative path of the entry in the zip archive.

value.span: 在 zip 存档中的项的相对路径。

span.span: The relative path of the entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含 zip 存档中某个条目的相对路径，包括子目录层次结构。The property contains the relative path, including the subdirectory hierarchy, of an entry in a zip archive. （相反， 属性仅包含条目的名称，不包括子目录层次结构。）例如，如果使用 方法在 zip 存档中创建了两个条目，并提供了 `NewEntry.txt` 作为第一个条目的名称，并且为第二个条目提供 `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`，则这两个条目将在 属性中具有 `NewEntry.txt`。(In contrast, the property contains only the name of the entry and does not include the subdirectory hierarchy.) For example, if you create two entries in a zip archive by using the method and provide `NewEntry.txt` as the name for the first entry and `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` for the second entry, both entries will have `NewEntry.txt` in the property. 第一项还将在 属性中 `NewEntry.txt`，但第二个条目将在 属性中具有 `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`。The first entry will also have `NewEntry.txt` in the property, but the second entry will have `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` in the property. 可以指定任意字符串作为条目的路径，包括指定无效路径和绝对路径的字符串。You can specify any string as the path of an entry, including strings that specify invalid and absolute paths. 因此， 属性可能包含格式不正确的值。Therefore, the property might contain a value that is not correctly formatted. 提取 zip 存档的内容时，无效路径或绝对路径可能会导致异常。An invalid or absolute path might result in an exception when you extract the contents of the zip archive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问 .zip 文件的内容，并提取包含 .txt 扩展名的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a .zip file, and extract files that contain the .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTimeOffset LastWriteTime { DateTimeOffset get(); void set(DateTimeOffset value); };
member this.LastWriteTime : DateTimeOffset with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置最近一次更改 zip 存档中的项的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed.

value.span: 最近一次更改 zip 存档中的项的时间。

span.span: The last time the entry in the zip archive was changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过调用 方法从现有文件创建新项时，该项的 属性将自动设置为上次修改该文件的时间。When you create a new entry from an existing file by calling the method, the property for the entry is automatically set to the last time the file was modified. 当你通过调用 方法以编程方式创建新条目时，该条目的 属性将自动设置为执行时间。When you create a new entry programmatically by calling the method, the property for the entry is automatically set to the time of execution. 如果你修改该条目，则必须显式设置 属性，如果你希望该值反映最近更改的时间。If you modify the entry, you must explicitly set the property if you want the value to reflect the time of the latest change. 设置此属性时， 值将转换为特定于 zip 存档的时间戳格式。When you set this property, the value is converted to a timestamp format that is specific to zip archives. 此格式支持两秒钟的解析。This format supports a resolution of two seconds. 最早允许的值为1980年1月 1 0:00:00 （午夜）。The earliest permitted value is 1980 January 1 0:00:00 (midnight). 最新允许的值为2107年12月 31 23:59:58 （午夜之前一秒）。The latest permitted value is 2107 December 31 23:59:58 (one second before midnight). 如果上次写入时间的值无效，则该属性返回默认值1980年1月 1 0:00:00 （午夜）。If the value for the last write time is not valid, the property returns a default value of 1980 January 1 0:00:00 (midnight). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开 zip 存档中的条目，对其进行修改，并将 属性设置为当前时间。The following example shows how to open an entry in a zip archive, modify it, and set the property to the current time. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program2.vb#2)]

exception.span: 尝试设置此属性失败，因为该项的 zip 存档处于 模式。

span.span: The attempt to set this property failed, because the zip archive for the entry is in mode.
The archive mode is set to .
-or-

exception.span: 存档模式已设置为 ，并且已打开该项。

span.span: The archive mode is set to and the entry has been opened.

exception.span: 已尝试将此属性的值设置为早于 1980 年 1 月 1 日 0:00:00（午夜）或晚于 2107 年 12 月 31 日 23:59:58 (午夜的前一秒钟)。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value that is either earlier than 1980 January 1 0:00:00 (midnight) or later than 2107 December 31 23:59:58 (one second before midnight).

[!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在 zip 存档中的项的文件名。

span.span: Gets the file name of the entry in the zip archive.

value.span: 在 zip 存档中的项的文件名。

span.span: The file name of the entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含位于最终目录分隔符（\\）后面的 属性部分，并且不包括子目录层次结构。The property contains the portion of the property that follows the final directory separator character (\\), and does not include the subdirectory hierarchy. 例如，如果使用 方法在 zip 存档中创建了两个条目，并提供了 `NewEntry.txt` 作为第一个条目的名称，并且为第二个条目提供 `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`，则这两个条目将在 属性中具有 `NewEntry.txt`。For example, if you create two entries in a zip archive by using the method and provide `NewEntry.txt` as the name for the first entry and `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` for the second entry, both entries will have `NewEntry.txt` in the property. 第一项还将在 属性中 `NewEntry.txt`，但第二个条目将在 属性中具有 `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`。The first entry will also have `NewEntry.txt` in the property, but the second entry will have `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` in the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从 zip 存档中检索项并评估这些项的属性。The following example shows how to retrieve entries from a zip archive and evaluate the properties of the entries. 它使用 属性显示项的名称，并使用 和 属性来计算文件的压缩量。It uses the property to display the name of the entry, and the and properties to calculate how much the file was compressed. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Stream Open() cil managed

summary.span: 打开 zip 存档中的项。

span.span: Opens the entry from the zip archive.
The stream that represents the contents of the entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以访问 zip 存档中的条目的流。You use this method to access the stream for an entry in a zip archive. 检索流后，可以读取或写入流。After retrieving the stream, you can read from or write to the stream. 写入流时，对该项所做的修改将显示在 zip 存档中。When you write to the stream, the modifications you make to the entry will appear in the zip archive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个新条目，使用 方法打开该条目，并将其写入到流中。The following example shows how to create a new entry, open it with the method, and write to the stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 当前已打开用于写入的项。

span.span: The entry is already currently open for writing.
-or-

span.span: The entry has been deleted from the archive.

span.span: The archive for this entry was opened with the mode, and this entry has already been written to.

exception.span: 存档中缺少该条目，或者该条目已损坏且无法读取。

span.span: The entry is either missing from the archive or is corrupt and cannot be read.
-or-

exception.span: 已经通过使用一种不受支持的压缩方法压缩该条目。

span.span: The entry has been compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

exception.span: 已释放此项的 zip 存档。

span.span: The zip archive for this entry has been disposed.
